Procurement Officer Job at Alliance Hospital and Services Limited




        
    

        
        Alliance Hospital and Services Limited is a Multi-Specialty Hospital located at No. 5 Malumfashi Close, Off Emeka Anyaoku Street, Area 11, Garki, F.C.T, Abuja. It was established with the goal of offering world class medical services thereby stopping medical tourism by Nigerians to foreign countries. To achieve this, we have set up a well-equipped hospital and assembled a team of highly motivated work force consisting of experts in different fields of Medicine and Surgery.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Alliance Hospital has most of the Medical and Surgical specialties fully functional. Our drive is quick and qualitative care at the lowest possible cost, while adhering to international best practice. The strategic location of the hospital in the heart of the Federal Capital Territory makes it easily accessible and the serene environment is a much needed elixir for our cherished patients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement Officer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Source reliable suppliers and maintain productive vendor partnerships.
	Ensure timely and cost-effective procurement of medical and non-medical supplies.
	Review and process purchase orders in line with hospital procurement policies.
	Monitor stock levels and coordinate with units for accurate demand forecasting.
	Track deliveries, resolve discrepancies, and maintain up-to-date procurement records.
	Ensure compliance with regulatory standards and internal audit requirements.
	Conduct market research to identify cost-saving opportunities without compromising quality.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Procurement, Business Administration, Supply Chain Management or related field.
	2–3 years of relevant experience (healthcare sector experience is an added advantage).
	Strong negotiation, analytical, and vendor-management skills.
	High level of integrity, attention to detail, and strong documentation abilities.
	Proficiency in MS Office; familiarity with ERP procurement modules is an advantage.


Salary
N150,000 - N170,000 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a cover letter to: hrdept@alliancehospitalabj.com using "Application for Procurement Officer" as the subject of the mail.
Or
Alternatively, applications may be submitted in person to the HR Department at:
Alliance Hospital and Services Limited,
No. 5 Malumfashi Close, Off Emeka Anyaoku Street,
Area 11, Garki,
FCT, Abuja.

Senior Account Officer Job at M+Azeezco International Limited




        
    

        
        M+Azeezco International Limited - We are an established Agricultural produce Export, Warehousing and Logistics company operating in Lagos State, Nigeria, for over 25 years.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Account Officer
Job Location: Apapa-Oshodi Expressway, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Maintain and reconcile all financial records for export transactions
	Prepare financial statements and management reports on export performance
	Reconcile export proceeds and manage foreign exchange documentation (Form NXP, domiciliary accounts)
	Compute the cost of goods sold (COGS) for farm produce export
	Monitor stock valuation and reconcile physical inventory with records
	Verify export documents such as invoices, packing lists, bills of lading, and certificates of origin
	Prepare and monitor annual and monthly warehouse budget
	Implement internal financial control and support audit processes
	Supervise junior accounting staff and coordinate with warehouse, export, logistics and procurement teams.


Requirements


	Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field (ICAN or ACCA is an advantage)
	4 - 6 years of accounting experience, with any experience working in agribusiness as a big advantage
	Sound knowledge of export documentation
	Proficiency in accounting software
	Strong analytical, communication and leadership skills
	High integrity, attention to detail and accountability.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a cover letter to: recruitment@azeezco.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: For proximity to work, candidates residing around Oshodi, Ilasamaja, Mushin, Surulere, Cele, Ago-Okota, Mile2 and environs are strongly encouraged.

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Marketing Associate",
  "description": "At Workforce Group, we go beyond narrowly defined client issues, beyond conventional wisdom, beyond the expected, to create opportunities for our clients, candidates, colleagues, collaborators, and community.

Through a network of diversified but highly complementary lines of businesses we have helped some of the most important and exciting organisations on the continent find the critical talent, access cutting edge advice and get innovative support they require to grow in a challenging market.

We support businesses and organisations of varying size, structure and maturity across diverse sectors such as Technology, Telecoms, Oil &amp; Gas, Financial Services, Third Sector, FMCG etc. to enhance business performance, optimise for growth and achieve exceptional results.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Associate

Job Locations:&nbsp;Mainland and Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Develop and implement marketing strategies to attract and retain customers.
